fields.description: This is the default printer of the server.
fields.label: Server Default Printer

fields.description: This will show all list of connected printers to the server.
fields.label: Server Printer List

fields.description: Enter ip address of the printer if you want to check printer is connected or not.
fields.label: IP Address

fields.description: Click on this button if you want to set another printer as default printer.
fields.label: Set Default

fields.description: This is the public folder path.
fields.label: Public path

fields.description: This is the output file path.
fields.label: output path

fields.description: This is the opacity of watermark of the drawings.
fields.label: Opacity

fields.description:
This is the page size of the drawings.
If item doesn't have page size then system will take this as default page size.
fields.label: Paper Size

fields.description:
This is the orientation of the drawings.
If item doesn't have orientation then system will take this as default orientation.
fields.label: Orientation

fields.description: Please note that if it is tick the new drawing pdf uploading will be mandatory
fields.label: New Drawing Pdf Required?
